com.xtructure.xutil.opt
Class XOption<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.cli.Option
      com.xtructure.xutil.opt.XOption<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of data this option represents
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanXOption, FileXOption, IntegerXOption, LongXOption
public abstract class XOption<T>
extends org.apache.commons.cli.Option

XOption extends Option with a name and argument processing.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

getOption

public static XOption<?> getOption(java.lang.String name,
                                   org.apache.commons.cli.Options options)
Finds the XOption in the given Options with the given name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the XOption to find
options - the Options to look through
Returns:
the found XOption, or null if there is no XOption with the given name
